About

Who Is Emmanuel Moyo?


Emmanuel Moyo is bringing you fascinating novels, novellas and short stories, written in Isindebele and English.

He was born on the 5th of April in 1993 at Luveve Clinic in Bulawayo. He grew up as a villsge boy in Matshetsheni Communual Land, Gwanda. Currently he is pursuing a law degree with the University Of Zimbabwe.

Emmanuel is passionate about farming and animal husbandry as well as encouraging the youth to be actively involved in preparing brighter futures.

Moyo has Authored a number of great books including the following:
A Letter To My Village Girl, Youth And The Prime Of Life Are FUtility, Ngisakhumbula, Ngakuthanda Usakhula, Ungawubasa Uzawotha, Emalangabini Othando, and many more.
